ComicInfo.Title: Inherit the Earth Part One: Secondary Protocols; Tales of ZVR; The Orphan Part One
ComicInfo.Summary:
The first-ever ONGOING Zombies vs Robots series, bringing you… new robots! A renewed zombie threat! New human survivors! And an all-new world ready for the taking from one or more of these factions... Part 1 of “Inherit the Earth!” and “The Orphan” start here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ashley Wood | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Gabriel Rodriguez | 2 | Sub | Subscription Blank Sketch Cover | None | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 18:30:20. [CVDB476819]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Inker: Anthony Diecidue, Ashley Wood, Val Mayerik
